name: Stop That Thief!
description:
Stop That Thief! is a 3D first-person hidden object fetch-quest game with a stealth element. The objective is to navigate the area to find & obtain unconventional items that can be used to disguise the player. The player must avoid being caught by the cop, who will chase after the player if they wear the incorrect disguise

You are a thief by passion, and stealing is your hobby! You’ve stolen so much that you’re now wanted by the police! Make your way around the city, stealing things as you please to disguise yourself from the cops set out to catch you. Successfully trick the police and steal your ultimate prize!

Visit our Website to learn more about Stop That Thief!

Controls:

WASD/Mouse – Navigate

SHIFT – Sprint

RIGHT CLICK – Crouch

E – Interact

TAB – Inventory

Q – Item Swap
